title: Cannot Connect to PVP.net, STILL?
body:
Like many had this problem in February, I am having the same error except it doesn't boot me out of the client. It says "Disconnected from PVP.net". I checked to see if all servers were up, yes they are, and I'm so frustrated. I've never had this problem before, and I didn't think it would last this long. It started at about 12 PM my time, and it is currently 1:30 AM.

Help, please?

replies.body:
Hi Funk Masta Vee,

Are you trying to play on the Oceanic server or the NA server (this is the Oceanic boards, btw).

If you haven't already checked it - take a look at the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support page, which has a lot of different things to try.

Cheers!
Mindstar
